conversation.text: <bos> WEATHER_KB: {"clear": "Sunny and cloudless", "cloudy": "Overcast with no precipitation", "rainy": "Light to heavy rain", "snowy": "Light to heavy snow", "thunderstorm": "Storm with thunder and lightning", "windy": "Strong winds"} <eos>
<bos> Cloudy weather is described as overcast with no precipitation in my WEATHER_KB knowledge base. <eos>
<bos> What kind of precipitation can happen during rainy weather? <eos>
<bos> Rainy weather can bring light to heavy rain. <eos>
<bos> A thunderstorm is a storm with thunder and lightning, according to my WEATHER_KB knowledge base. <eos>
<bos> Windy weather is characterized by strong winds. <eos>
